channel.title: Music – 리나(Lina)

item.title: 리나(Lina) - Morning Coffee
item.description:
살며시 다가와
날 감싸 안아 주던
따스한
그대 향기처럼
Sweet heart 이 아침
커피 한잔 함께해
That’s fine
지금 이 순간
그대와 every day
every time I miss you
Take my love
close your eyes
Stay with me
wherever
I know like morning
coffee and sugar cream
그대와 every day
every time I miss you
Take my love
close your eyes
Stay with me
wherever
I swear you are
my everything love you
We’ve been living
in a dream
Just pain
I miss your heart
Don’t be sad
we live in paradise
I can’t explain
the way I feel
Wind blow away
that’s fine
We will be
free to fly

날 감싸 안아 주던

그대 향기처럼

every time I miss you
Take my love
close your eyes
Stay with me
wherever
I know like morning
coffee and sugar cream

every time I miss you
Take my love
close your eyes
Stay with me
wherever
I swear you are
my everything love you
